Articles.Content:
Now I know I just made another thread recent, but this come out absolutely wonderfully.

This needs the Fixed Camera Mod, DamnedAerospace and DamnedRobotics to work.

Camera mod is just wonderful isn\'t it?

I\'m not sure if the propeller used from the DamnedAerospace has much to do with it or not, of if its just that I try to get the balance as good as possible, but this thing flies just fantastic, as can be seen in the video. Great fun plane to fly.
Just a friendly heads-up: I think you may have posted the wrong video there.

Just a friendly heads-up: I think you may have posted the wrong video there.

haha, whoops!

Fixed now, thanks for that!
Very cool looking plane. I\'m impressed with how slowly and evenly it handles.
last time i tried the corsair...*brrrrrrrr....* tht was NOT a successful attempt.
